messages.title: SNP local champions - working for you
messages.content: Jim Barrie is one of the SNP's 59 local champions, pledged to hear the concerns of this community, to work hard and represent us effectively in Westminster. Jim will defend local jobs and services, argue for a fair deal on fuel prices, and for pensions to be increased in line with earnings.

issues.economy: Jim will defend local jobs and services, argue for a fair deal on fuel prices
issues.governance: The SNP has already delivered so much: The Council Tax frozen, tolls off the Tay and Forth Bridges, reduced rates for small businesses, record numbers of police on our streets and much more
issues.health: Harris Academy is to be rebuilt
issues.socialWelfare: argue for a fair deal on fuel prices, and for pensions to be increased in line with earnings

housing.content: Millions have been secured for Dundee's Waterfront, Harris Academy is to be rebuilt, Lochee High Street is being redeveloped and our Universities have been supported to keep them at the forefront of Dundee's vital life sciences and digital media industries.

images.caption: Group photo with SNP local champions

leaflet.additionalNotes: Vote for Jim Barrie on Thursday 6 May, don't just vote for another politician.
